snippet.title: Vigilantes Release Trailer: Neo noir turn based tactics, coming to Steam 3rd Oct!
snippet.description:
Vigilantes is a the neo noir turn based tactical RPG for PC, allowing you to lead a team of hard boiled Vigilantes against the criminal underworld.

Vigilantes offers hardcore squad-level combat, intel gathering through surveillance and interrogation, a detailed character system, base building, crafting, and much more. 

More info can be found on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/545600/Vigilantes/ or at www.timeslipsoftworks.com
